Nevermind. I got it working.

Thank you very much!
It's a wonderfull Christmas present ;D
It works and it's very easy to install, remember to follow the install notes which are very easy to use:

 INSTALL NOTES:                                                

          1. Install the Application                                    
          2. Enter anything for Username and Key ID, use as much data   
          as it can fit                                                 
          3. Choose offline activation                                  
          4. Use keygen to generate Activation Key      

Thanks again!
To get the RSE working go to the folder that has all of the files in it and click the update file. Click yes to whatever it says and it should work. Did for me

Also: no matter what the code I'm given by guitar pro is, the code from the keygen is the EXACT same. Every time. 
X in; Y out.
B in; Y out.

SO for me it was simple!!

1.Downloaded http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5807746/Guitar_Pro_6.0.1_r7840(with soundbanks and all)
2.Installed it easily.
3.Started the application 
4.Pressed offline activation
5.Copied the text from gp6 to the keygen of this torrent
6.Pasted the activation from keygen to gp6
7.Everything went smooth!!!

Tnx for the keygen it was great!
(tip: stop the app from updating every weak)

Ok noobs, read the instruction

install program
open program it will ask for user name :just type anything at all and use as many keystrokes as you can
then click offline activation
it will give you a bunch of code,letters numbers....
copy and paste that into the key gen where is says REQUEST
click generate
it will give you a bunch of code
copy and paste that into the guitar program response
done
